15.eng-name: The Book of Shortening the Prayer When Traveling

hadiths.text: Wabarah bin Abdur-Rahman said:"Ibn 'Umar did not offer more than two rak'ahs when traveling, and he did not offer any prayer before or after that. It was said to him: 'What is this?' He said: 'This is what I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) doing

chapter.eng-name: Not performing voluntary prayers while traveling
